author: nameless73
title: Colour and Movement
review:
It is lovely to open a box with technic parts and be bombarded with colour. 

As a creator set, the instructions booklet provides 5 exemplar models to build, with extra ones online. They model different ways to use the gear pieces. 

With only one model being transport related (a helicopter), they provide a more imaginative use of technic parts which should help children use more moving parts in creative builds. 

Pros

- wide range of colours

- springboard for builds with moving parts

- lots of fun

Cons

- wide range means fewer of each type
